artist: William Kentridge; Editor: Snezana Marovic; Composer: Music by Neo Muyanga
classification: Time-based Media, Digital Art, Artist Installations
medium: Single video projection with stereo audio
signed: on certificate of authenticity, in black: W Kentridge
text: William Kentridge is an internationally renowned artist best known for his prints, drawings, and animated films. Second-hand Reading is an excellent example of Kentridge’s animation style, and his ongoing personal investigation of South Africa and its history of apartheid. It is a powerful artwork that explores race relations in South Africa through drawings, text, and music.
title: Second-hand Reading
